item.description:
We're baaaaaaaaaaack!  :-)  The Mini-Meetup SSBB has returned for 2012 with the ambition to top last year's event.  Can we make this the most attended event of 2012?

The Mini-Meetups I host during the year are about getting together people with similar gaming tastes by focusing on a specific kind of game or theme.  This event seeks to get everyone together to create the largest selection of game activity on the North Shore so people can play whatever they want.  This day is about everything.  Outdoor games, card games, strategy games, word games, video games... so no matter what your taste in fun is, you'll find it here (unless you fancy winter games like curling, sorry there will be no snow or ice).  ;-)

This year, we are going to historic Topsfield to party at the Gould Barn, 20 minutes north of downtown Salem.  It has a capacity to hold 100 people, a huge outdoor area and a large indoor area for dancing.  That's right folks, I expect to see all the people who have been taking salsa lessons recently to show us their moves!

Excited yet?  Here's how to get involved:

  1. Sign up and feel free to invite friends, family, co-workers and the general public.  All are invited!
  2. Please consider bringing a food and drink item and putting it in your RSVP.  This is a potluck feast so we can only eat what people bring.  Grill fires up at 4:30.
  3. Bring your favorite games (including outdoor stuff) and games you haven't played in a while.  The goal today is to have variety.
  4. Bring your happy face and prepare to have fun!

Doors open at 1pm and we'll party until 11.  With a large indoor area, this event is rain or shine. We'll even have wifi for all your Words with Friends fixes!

So come everyone celebrate the wonderful friendships we've created with each other in a day of pure gaming bliss.  Hope to see you there! :-D

---

Parking:

South of the Gould Barn is a large parking lot which you can use to park.  This parking lot is located on E Common Street (if you want to plug an address into the GPS for the parking use 9 E Common Street).  Head north from the parking lot through the trees to get to the Barn area.

---

Menu:

Here's what people are bringing so far.

Entrees:

  • Kielbasa - Billie-Jo
  • Turkey burgers - Richard
  • Turkey dogs - Liv
  • Beef shish-ka-bob - Mary
  • Vegan burgers - Barry
  • Beef burgers, beef hot dogs, chicken, cheese, whatever else is needed for the grill - Ryan

Sides:

  • Salad - Billie-Jo
  • Potato Salad - Cindy K.
  • Pasta Salad - Billie-Jo
  • Coleslaw - Sandy
  • Green beans w/almonds - Richard
  • Gluten-free/vegan side - Liv
  • Corn on the cob - Mary
  • Seafood salad finger rolls - Sandy
  • Some kind of side dish - Louise

Snacks:

  • Some kind of snacks - Laurel

Desserts:

  • Brownies - Billie-Jo
  • Fruit salad - Rosemarie
  • Fruit salad - Shari
  • Some kind of dessert - Kim
  • Marshmallows - Sandy
  • Cupcakes - Louise
  • Baklava - Tom

Drinks:

  • 4 bottles of some kind of soda - Liv
  • Bottles of Coke Zero - Sandy
  • White chocolate martinis - Sandy
  • 2 bottles of water - Louise
  • Beer - Sam
  • Diet coke - Cindy

Misc:

  • Buns - Laurel, Maris, Erin
  • Dijon mustard - Laurel
  • Ketchup, relish, other condiments - Rosemarie
  • ICE - Rosemarie, Erin, Cindy
